title: How to Play the Spiral Abyss in Genshin Impact

steps.title: Get to Cape Oath.
steps.content: Get to Cape Oath. Cape Oath is the southeasternmost point in Mondstadt. To do so, teleport there, or teleport to Eagle's Gate and head east.

steps.title: Defeat the Electro slimes.
steps.content: Defeat the Electro slimes. A few will spawn near some Electro crystals located near the Seelie gardens. After defeating the Electro slimes, it will be easier to place the Seelies in their location.

steps.title: Find and follow the Seelies.
steps.content: Find and follow the Seelies. This should not be super hard; they are turquoise orbs floating around Teyvat. There should be three Seelies that need to be found to activate the wind gust. One of the Seelies can be found on a nearby cliff. Another one can be found underneath a tree. The final Seelie is located near the very edge of Cape Oath.

steps.title: Travel up the wind gust to reach the portal.
steps.content: Travel up the wind gust to reach the portal. Move towards the portal. Once you touch it, you will reach Musk Reef and the Spiral Abyss.

steps.title: Enter the Spiral Abyss.
steps.content: Enter the Spiral Abyss. To do so, select "Spiral Abyss" when near the domain entrance. The first time you enter, the portal will turn from red to blue, indicating the teleportation waypoint associated with the domain is unlocked. The domain unlocks at adventure level 20.

steps.title: Click on Start.
steps.content: Click on Start . You will, by default, start at the last floor that you left off at. To start at a different floor, click on it. You must have unlocked that floor and chamber to do so. Before you do so, it may be helpful to look at the different enemies you will encounter on the floor as well as any elemental buffs you may receive for the current floor.

steps.title: Select four characters to comprise your party.
steps.content: Select four characters to comprise your party. After doing so, press Start to enter the Abyss. You will not be able to eat food or change party members until you clear the floor, and the nature of the Abyss is such that you will always start with full health at the beginning of every floor.

steps.title: Know how the Spiral Abyss works.
steps.content: Know how the Spiral Abyss works. Each floor consists of three chambers, with each chamber containing enemies of varying difficulty. The goal of the Spiral Abyss is to beat all the enemies in a set time period or while protecting a monolith in the chamber.

steps.title: Select a (de)buff.
steps.content: Select a (de)buff. Three different buffs will be presented to you at the beginning. Some buffs will affect you for the entire floor, while others will affect you for the current chamber only.

steps.title: Proceed to the large key or monolith.
steps.content: Proceed to the large key or monolith. Then select Start . This will begin the challenge for the current chamber.

steps.title: Defeat all the enemies.
steps.content: Defeat all the enemies. The enemies will spawn one by one. Depending on the floor, this can also be done by knocking them out of the arena. Don't fall out of bounds or let all your characters die; this will result in you failing the current chamber. You will also fail if you don't defeat all the enemies on time or if you failed to protect the monolith, depending on the chamber.

steps.title: Continue to the next chamber.
steps.content: Continue to the next chamber. After all the enemies are defeated, you will see a results screen. You will receive either one, two, or three stars depending on your overall performance. You can also select Leave for now to come back to the Spiral Abyss later. After reaching the end of the third chamber, you will go up a floor and will get an opportunity to switch your party.

steps.title: Leave the Spiral Abyss.
steps.content: Leave the Spiral Abyss. To do so, click the leave button or press the Esc key and choose Leave for now .

steps.title: Select the Spiral Abyss.
steps.content: Select the Spiral Abyss. To do so, select "Spiral Abyss" when near the domain entrance.

steps.title: Click on the box on each floor.
steps.content: Click on the box on each floor. This will collect the rewards, which are usually Primogems and Mora.
